Learning to rank for Information Retrieval (IR) is a task to automatically construct a ranking mode
Then the empirical evaluations on typical learning-to-rank methods are shown, with the LETOR collection as a benchmark dataset
The paper is concerned with learning to rank which is to construct a model or a function for ranking objects.
Several methods for learning to rank

Term weighting is a fundamental problem in IR research and numerous weighting models have been proposed.

Proper term weighting can greatly improve retrieval accuracies \which essentially involves two types of query understanding:interpreting the query and judging the relative contribution of the terms to the query"
The proposed method is simple yet effective.
